seo.title: Batch Image Compressor - Optimize JPG/PNG/WebP
seo.keywords: image compressor, reduce image size, compress png, optimize jpg, free online tool
seo.description: Compress unlimited images locally. Reduce file size up to 90% without quality loss. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP.

hero.title: Batch Image Compressor
hero.subtitle: Compress locally. No server upload. Fast, Secure, and Free.

steps.title: Upload Images
steps.desc: Drag & drop multiple JPG, PNG, or WebP images.

steps.title: Adjust Quality
steps.desc: Choose compression level. Use the slider to balance quality and size.

steps.title: Download
steps.desc: Download optimized images individually or as a ZIP.

features.title: High Efficiency
features.desc: Smart compression algorithms reduce size significantly while maintaining visual quality.

features.title: Privacy First
features.desc: Everything happens in your browser. Your photos never leave your device.

features.title: Bulk Processing
features.desc: Handle hundreds of images at once with no limits.

faq.a: We use smart lossy compression that is visually lossless to the human eye in most cases.
Yes, it runs 100% offline in your browser.
